short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and mute audible Chrome tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find and mute audible Chrome tabs
- see a list of your audible chrome tabs
- toggle whether each tab is muted
- simpler than looking for all your tabs across diferent windows
